mapper.select: SELECT account_id, username, CONCAT(profile_image_url_endpoint, profile_image_url_path) AS profile_image_url FROM profiles WHERE account_id = #{accountId};

SELECT account_id, username, CONCAT(profile_image_url_endpoint, profile_image_url_path) AS profile_image_url, CHAR_LENGTH(username) AS username_size FROM profiles WHERE account_id != #{accountId} AND username != '' AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(REPLACE(#{keyword}, '!', '!!'), '%', '!%'), '%') ESCAPE '!' ORDER BY username_size ASC LIMIT 100

SELECT profiles.account_id AS account_id, profiles.username AS username, CONCAT(profile_image_url_endpoint, profile_image_url_path) AS profile_image_url FROM members LEFT OUTER JOIN profiles ON members.member = profiles.account_id WHERE members.shared_group_id = #{sharedGroupId} AND members.member != #{accountId};
